typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Order as string,
		Client as string,
		Visit as string,
		Site as string,
		{Premises Name} as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		{Item to order} as string,
		{Actual Visit Date} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Actual Visit Time} as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss',
		{AM / PM} as string,
		{Pass-Fail} as string,
		{Pass-Fail2} as string,
		{Abort Reason} as string,
		{Extra Site 1} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'audits',
	fileName: '3 year data v3.xlsx',
	sheetName: '3 year data v1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> InputExcel
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Clients
Clients select(mapColumn(
		exsisting_id = id,
		legacy_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LegacyClientIds
InputExcel aggregate(groupBy(Client),
	name = max(Client)) ~> ImportedClients
ImportedClients, LegacyClientIds lookup(Client == legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(legacy_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClientsLookedUp
ComputedColumns alterRow(insertIf(isNull(exsisting_id))) ~> ClientsPrepared
ClientsLookedUp derive(id = coalesce(exsisting_id, Client),
		status = 'active',
		legacy_id = coalesce(legacy_id, Client),
		entity_source = 'historical-import') ~> ComputedColumns
ClientsPrepared sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		status,
		legacy_id,
		status,
		entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MergedClients

source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		update_type as string,
		status as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HistoricClients
Lookup3 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(internal_id))) ~> AlterRow1
HistoricClients, ExistingIds lookup(id == existing_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_id))) ~> AlterRow2
source2 select(mapColumn(
		existing_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingIds
source1, ExistingIds lookup(id == existing_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
